top_comments.comment: I would add some coasters, a box of tissues, bottled water and a small trash can.  Great video!
I look at my guest rooms as if I am going to stay there: is it comfortable, is the light within easy reach when reading in bed, etc etc. Thank you for the tips, I am missing the comfy throw! 😍
Lisa you are totally a rock star.

I know this is random but would you give tips for a buy to rent home.we have a 2 bed that we are renovating from the brickwork out new electrics etc to rent to tenants.  I would love some help with decor or feel ideas.

My daughter in law always has a goodie basket for us when we visit.  We just love it!  She always includes our favorite candies, Tylenol, small creams, bottles of water and linen spray.  Outstanding room and daughter in law!
